  • Classes in therian.operator.convert used by therian.operator.convert 
    Class and Description
    AbstractConverter
    Abstract Convert Operator superclass.
    AssignableElementConverter
    Abstract Converter of objects with elements that are assignable from source to target.
    Converter
    Convert Operator superclass.
    Converter.WithDynamicTarget
    Accommodates the situation where a Converter applies to multiple target types that share no common descendant as in the case of e.g.
    CopyingConverter
    Abstract base class for a converter that defers its work to a Copy Operation.
    CopyingConverter.Implementing
    Intermediate step in fluent interface.
    ELCoercionConverter
    Special operator that handles conversions by applying EL coercion rules.
    NOPConverter.NullBehavior
    NullBehavior TherianContext.Hint
